page.title: 03FARMING AROUND PEBMARSH
page.content: The farms in our area are mainly{ {arable.}Only one farmer,Mr.Chamley,keeps only{ {livestock.}He has a large flock of{ {sheep,}Welsh hill crossed with a Suffolk ram,and a small herd of{ {Friesian}cows. The arable farmers grow {wheat and barley}(mostly sown in the Autumn),{sugar beet,peas,beans}and {oil-seed rape. }Most of the land in our area is farmed by three farmers- {Mr.Crayston-Crick's Farm;Mr.Hogsbjerg- {Le Mote;Mr.Nott-Hunt's Hall. Mr.Crayston farms 176 acres,Mr.Hogsbje rg farms 384 acres and Mr.Nott farms 840 acres.Mr.Hogsbjerg has a small herd of{Hereford}cattle and 5000 chickens. Mr.Nott also keeps chickens. There is an{apple orchard}at Fishpits and a{chicken farm}at Baggaretts.The rest of the land is farmed by small farmers.
